biotools.summary: Impute and phase genotype data in populations with pedigree information available. The program uses segregation analysis and haplotype library imputation to impute alleles and genotypes.

bioschemas.name: AlphaImpute
bioschemas.summary: Impute and phase genotype data in populations with pedigree information available. The program uses segregation analysis and haplotype library imputation to impute alleles and genotypes.
